p.span: THINK YOU CAN YOU FIND IT?

div.p: BY A MR. OKMYX. HE SAID--
I KNOW WHAT HE SAID, BUD.
AND I RUN IT, THAT'S ALL.
HERE SO YOU COULD HELP ME,
I GOT TO MAKE SOME HITS.
TO GIVE ME THE THINGS I WANT.
I'M GOING TO CALL UP YOUR SHIP
AND HAVE THEM PICK YOU UP--
ALL YOU HAVE TO DO IS
AND PUT THEM IN A BAG.
SHOW ME HOW TO USE THEM.
SPOCK, IF YOU COULD GET TO
WHEN YOU'D NEED A QUEEN AND A 4.
IF YOU HAD GOTTEN A KING,
WHEN YOU'D HAVE TO GIVE IT BACK.
I'M THE HEAD OF THE WHOLE
HEY, I'M GLAD TO SEE YOU.
NO, NO, NO, I DON'T THINK
AND HOW DO YOU LIKE THAT?
I WANT YOU TO TELL ME
CAN MAKE A MAN A PRETTY
WE MADE A DEAL WITH KRAKO.
HANG OF IT, NOW, GO ON.
FOR A PIECE OF THE PIE.
I'VE GOT A LOT OF NERVE.
I HEAR A LOT OF TALK,
TO TAKE A LOOK AT WHAT
LET ME CALL MY SHIP ONE
WAY IF WE WANTED THEM TO.
